query create table sensors
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE sensors (sensorID INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY," +
    " seller CHAR(42),  sensorType TINYINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "price VARCHAR(78), startTime INT UNSIGNED, frequency SMALLINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "latitude FLOAT(9,6), longtitude FLOAT(9,6), url VARCHAR(2083), " +
    "logIndex INT, transactionIndex INT, transactionHash CHAR(66), " +
    "blockNumber BIGINT, blockHash CHAR(66))"  ;

return msg ;

drop table sensors

msg.topic = "DROP TABLE sensors" ;

return msg ;

    "buyer CHAR(42), sensorID INT UNSIGNED, " +
    "fromTime INT UNSIGNED, toTime INT UNSIGNED, " +
    "amount VARCHAR(78)," +
    "logIndex INT, transactionIndex INT, transactionHash CHAR(66), " +
    "blockNumber BIGINT, blockHash CHAR(66))"  ;

return msg ;

/*
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE AthensStationOpenweathermap (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature SMALLINT, " +
    "humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED," +
    "visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED, windSpeed SMALLINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "windDirection SMALLINT UNSIGNED, clouds TINYINT UNSIGNED)" ;
*/

msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE sensor1 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature FLOAT(10,2)) ;" +    //temperature
"CREATE TABLE sensor2 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor3 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor4 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor5 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, speed FLOAT(10,2) UNSIGNED, direction SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor6 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, cloudCoverage TINYINT UNSIGNED) ;" ;

/*
Temperature
Humidity
Pressure
Visibility
Wind (speed and direction)
Sky cloud coverage
*/

return msg ;

name: Output from mysql
Output from mysql
Transform data before DB
func:
var timestamp = msg.data.dt ;
var temp = msg.payload.tempc ;   //C
var hum = msg.payload.humidity ;   //%
var press = Math.round(msg.data.main.pressure) ;    //hPa
var vis = msg.data.visibility ;           //meters
var wSpeed = msg.payload.windspeed ;         //m/s, *100 to loose decimals
var wDir = msg.payload.winddirection ;          //meteorological degrees
var skyCloudCov = msg.data.clouds.all ;         //%

var newMsg = { 
        time : timestamp,
        temperature : temp,
        humidity : hum,
        pressure : press,
        visibility : vis,
        windSpeed : wSpeed,
        windDirection : wDir,
        skyCloudCoverage : skyCloudCov
};

return newMsg ;

create tables (darksky)
func:
/*
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE AthensStationDarksky (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature SMALLINT, " +
    "humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED," +
    "visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED, windSpeed SMALLINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "windDirection SMALLINT UNSIGNED, clouds TINYINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "dewPoint SMALLINT, UV SMALLINT UNSIGNED, ozone SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" ;
*/

msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE sensor15 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature FLOAT(10,2)) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor16 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor17 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor18 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor19 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, speed FLOAT(10,2) UNSIGNED, direction SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor20 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, cloudCoverage TINYINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor21 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, dewPoint FLOAT(10,2)) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor22 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, uv SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor23 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, ozone FLOAT(16,2) UNSIGNED) ;" ;

/*
Temperature
Humidity
Pressure
Visibility
Wind (speed and direction)
Sky cloud coverage in percent
Dew point
UV
Ozone
*/

return msg ;

empty tables (darksky)
Transform data before DB
func:
var timestamp = msg.data.currently.time ;
var temp = msg.data.currently.temperature ;       //C
var hum = Math.round(msg.data.currently.humidity * 100) ;  //%
var press = Math.round(msg.data.currently.pressure) ;      //hPa
var vis = Math.round(msg.data.currently.visibility * 1000) ;    //km
var wSpeed = msg.payload.windspeed ;         //m/s
var wDir = msg.payload.winddirection ;      //meteorological degrees
var skyCloudCov = Math.round(msg.data.currently.cloudCover * 100) ; //%
var dewP = msg.data.currently.dewPoint * 100 ;          //C
var uvRadiation = msg.data.currently.uvIndex ;          //0-11
var oz = msg.data.currently.ozone ;     //Dobson

var newMsg = { 
        time : timestamp,
        temperature : temp,
        humidity : hum,
        pressure : press,
        visibility : vis,
        windSpeed : wSpeed,
        windDirection : wDir,
        skyCloudCoverage : skyCloudCov,
        dewPoint : dewP,
        uv : uvRadiation,
        ozone : oz
};

return newMsg ;

create tables (wunderground) Thessaloniki
func:
/*
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE AthensStationWunderground (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature SMALLINT, " +
    "humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED," +
    "visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED, windSpeed SMALLINT UNSIGNED, " +
    "windDirection SMALLINT UNSIGNED, dewPoint SMALLINT, " +
    "UV SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" ;
*/

msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE sensor24 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, temperature FLOAT(10,2)) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor25 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, humidity TINYINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor26 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, pressure SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor27 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, visibility SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor28 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, speed FLOAT(10,2) UNSIGNED, direction SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor29 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, dewPoint FLOAT(10,2)) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor30 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, solarRad SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" +
"CREATE TABLE sensor31 (time INT UNSIGNED PRIMARY KEY, uv SMALLINT UNSIGNED) ;" ;

/*
Temperature
Humidity
Pressure
Visibility
Wind (speed and direction)
Dew point
Solar radiation
UV
*/


return msg ;
